Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, welcome home!
<PAGE>
Seein' how today's White Day, I made some
sweets for you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <NICKNAME>. I've been waiting
for you. You know today is White Day, correct?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home! Got some sweets for the
sweetheart, just in time for White Day!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home. You did remember today is
White Day, correct?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <NICKNAME>. Today's White
Day, right?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home. I've been waiting for you. You
remember today's White Day, right?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home. You remember what day today
is, correct?
<PAGE>
It's Valentine's Day, of course! And I just so
happen to have some sweets prepared for you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home, <NICKNAME>. I've been waiting
for you to walk through that door.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aha! Welcome home! You remember today's
Valentine's Day, right? I made some sweets for
you.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home. Since today is Valentine's Day, I
made a batch of sweets just for you!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home. I'm sure that you've been
anticipating my Valentine's Day sweets all day.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welcome home. Today's er, Valentine's Day,
right? I made some sweets for you.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Go on and dig in! Oh...you don' t mind if I
sample a few too, right?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I've made some sweets. Why don't we enjoy
them together?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Go on and dig in! I promise you'll love 'em. I
hear the chef is amazing.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made some delicious confections. Let's both
enjoy them together.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made some dessert. How about we have some
together?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I tried my hand at making sweets. I don't know
how good they are, but I'm betting there's a
strong chance they're edible.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What are you waiting for? Desserts demand
immediate action! Let's go eat some right now.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is Valentine's Day, so I baked some
sweets for you. Why don't we enjoy them
together?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
C'mon, I'll help you eat them.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's have them together. That sounds like fun.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, how about we enjoy them together?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It'd be...y'know...pretty cool if we ate them
together.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Mm! Not bad. Maybe I should give up this whole
farming thing and become a dessert chef.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>No, wait. Raeger's already got a years-long head
start on me...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well? Don't be shy. Dig in! Dig in!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Y'know, it's really nice to be able to sit back and
enjoy some good food, just the two of us.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I tried to make it only mildly sweet. But if it's still
too sweet, take solace in the fact that you are far
sweeter still.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know you'll enjoy it, but no overindulging,
okay?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm. Not bad. Quite decent, in fact. I'll try to
make them better next time, though. For today,
you'll just have to make do with these.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well? How do you like 'em?
<PAGE>
I know they're good, but I'm still really curious
what you think.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I held nothing back for you, <NICKNAME>. Let me
know what you think once you've tried them.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mm, yep. These are darn good. Maybe I should
add 'em to the restaurant's menu...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I worked really hard on this. What do you think?
<PAGE>
Personally, I think it came out rather well. They
pair nicely with a warm cup of tea, too.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Phew. You like it. That's quite a relief.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even after marriage, it is important for us to say
aloud the love we assume is just understood.
There's a certain weight in that.
<PAGE>
To enjoy each other while enjoying sweets...
That is the point behind both Valentine's Day and
White Day.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? Is it good? I guess it'll do.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrm. This ain't half bad.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here. Thanks. This dessert is a token of my
feelings for you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Mmm. I'm saved; it's edible. Besides, it's the
thought that counts, right?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah well. Even if it isn't the best, I'd make a
thousand treats for the chance to sit and enjoy
some time together with you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here. This is a token of my feelings for you.
Thanks for everything.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mm. It is rather tasty, don't you agree?
<PAGE>
You do agree, correct? Excellent! I will make it
for you again someday.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I tried my very best and made this by hand, so
you had better enjoy it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made this as a token of my feelings for you,
<NICKNAME>. Do uphold my faith in you and
continue to be wonderful, would you?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. For something I made myself, it actually
turned out to be pretty good.
<PAGE>
Mm, and from the look on your face, I'd say
you're pretty satisfied as well.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once a year, a wife will show her gratitude to
her husband in the form of delicious, hand-
made sweets. That's Valentine's Day.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mm, this is actually rather good. All that extra
effort really made a difference!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Seeing you get all excited over it totally made
baking it worthwhile.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made this just for you. I hope you like it.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mm, it's really good! I put a lot of effort into it,
because I wanted to let you know how much I
care about you.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I worked really hard to bake this, so I'm sure it's
going to be really yummy.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really hope you like it, <NICKNAME>. If you're
happy, then I'm happy.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This dessert is a li'l token of my feelings for you.
I'm looking forward to many more satisfying
years with you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is still a dessert, though, so do not
overindulge. Too much sugar is unhealthy.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have made it on the milder side, but do not
take that as an excuse to overindulge.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm. For its mildness, this is still very well
done. Delicious.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mm! This is actually good! I never expected it
would turn out this well.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Er...so maybe this one didn't turn out as well as
it could have. Sorry. I guess this isn't your lucky
year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>What? You like it? Wow, thanks.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is, well...kinda plain, I guess. It isn't bad,
per se, but it's kind of an...acquired taste.
Yeaaaah, let's put it like that.
Mmm, that was good!
